name: Submarine Jump!
description:
Gain speed and jump out of the water, into the skies!
Tap to rotate your submarine to do as many flips as possible for more currency, make sure you land safely though or it’s game over.
Upgrade your submarine to go further and explore new heights.
Can you make it into space?
Submarine Jump! features:
- Simple and addictive gameplay
- Numerous upgrades to keep you progressing
- Colourful design with new areas to explore
- Offline earnings to keep you going
publishers: Clap Clap Desenvolvimento de Jogos Ltda ME
